title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Almelo, Netherlands
content:
Photo submitted by Dagmar Veelers, “I had a nice flow today and I would like this to share with you. It’s a ride in the East of the Netherlands called het Almelo-Nordhorn kanaal (canal). Very nice roadpath for cyclist.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Almelo, Netherlands appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
